nodes.text: The planet Wayland was attacked by the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders in 3963 BBY, during the Mandalorian Wars. Mandalorian forces launched from the occupied planet Taris devastated Wayland, wiping out the planet's colonists and a number of factories owned by Lhosan Industries. After Wayland, the Mandalorians moved on to the planet Myrkr.
